body.subject: Query about pricing details
body.message: Hi team, I would like to know more about your pricing plans and any available offers.

body.subject: Inquiry about services provided
body.message: Hello, I'm interested in understanding the services your company provides. Please share more details.

body.subject: Need help with product setup
body.message: Hi team, I'm facing issues with setup. Need support asap.

body.subject: General inquiry
body.message: Hello, I have a few questions regarding your product. Please get back to me at your earliest convenience.
